VideoClassificationParameters.title: VideoClassificationParameters
VideoClassificationParameters.description: Additional inference parameters for Video Classification

functionToApply.title: TextClassificationOutputTransform
functionToApply.description: The function to apply to the model outputs in order to retrieve the scores.

numFrames.description: The number of sampled frames to consider for classification.

frameSamplingRate.description: The sampling rate used to select frames from the video.

topK.description: When specified, limits the output to the top K most probable classes.
